definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: I’ve been in that situation lately.
sentences.chinese: 我不久前也曾身陷這樣的處境。

sentences.english: Though he surfaced from time to time in the years after, Dengar's current whereabouts and activities are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 登加後來時隱時現，他目前的處境和活動不得而知。

sentences.english: This difficulties situation affects the sales of our merchandises.
sentences.chinese: 此種困難的處境已影響到我們商品的銷售。

sentences.english: We've got to overshoot, we're having difficulties with the landing gear.
sentences.chinese: 我們復飛，我們起落架處境困難。

sentences.english: He said the situation for civilians has become intolerable.
sentences.chinese: 他說，平民百姓的處境已經到了不能容忍的地步。

sentences.english: The sad condition of these refugees would move a heart of stone to sympathy。
sentences.chinese: 這些難民的悲慘處境能使一個鐵石心腸動容。

sentences.english: The undergraduate's understanding of his situation was correct.
sentences.chinese: 大學生對自己處境的理解是正確的。

sentences.english: I disdained the situation with regard emperors swap .
sentences.chinese: 我不屑把處境跟帝王對調。

sentences.english: Remember, you always have the power to change your situation.
sentences.chinese: 請記住，您永遠都具備力量來改變您的處境。

sentences.english: In the moment of that thought the desperateness of his situation dawned upon him.
sentences.chinese: 想起他，他明白了自己目前處境的發發可危。

sentences.english: He tole me that the girl was in danger, so we went to help her.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我這女孩處境危險，因此我們去幫她。

sentences.english: Moreover, artists from different backgrounds do not raise their doubts in similar manners.
sentences.chinese: 再者，不同處境的藝術家，提出質疑的方式又很不同。

sentences.english: Benedict recalled the plight of "street children who do not have the blessing of a family home."
sentences.chinese: 教皇提醒信徒不要忘記那些無家可歸的流浪兒的處境。

sentences.english: But there’s a lot you can do, no matter what your situation.
sentences.chinese: 但如論你處境如何，還是有許多事情你是能夠去做的。

sentences.english: We can seek reasons from Shunshui's history circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 這應該從舜水的歷史處境找原因。

sentences.english: His praise would only cart me worse.
sentences.chinese: 他的表揚只會讓我處境更糟。
